name: Go Fish (ethanmil)
description:
Stockpile & sell your fish to earn gold. Try to earn the most gold within the limited time. Note that you can only hold up to 6 fish at once. Avoid the whirlpools or use them to your advantage by slingshotting around them.

Arrow keys to navigate, Space bar to catch fish & sell @ the shop.

This game was written in Golang along with Ebitengine. 

Game assets:

- https://finalbossblues.itch.io/icons

- https://paperhatlizard.itch.io/cryos-mini-gui
